title: Azure - LF Serious Team Members Plat +
body:
Hello Guys, My name is XSirCution and I would like to create a serious team that will be starting at 22nd February so rank up first in that time. We are currently looking for team members that are serious and would like to participate in competitive gameplay.
We are looking for both starters and subs so if anyone is interested add, leave a comment below and add me in game or Rakragap. If there is anyone out there who would like to be our manager, that would be highly appreciated as well. Thank you for your time

-XSirCution

ps my role preffered is support or jungle

Thx a lot for the application, Rakragap will fill you in on the information.
Btw we're also looking for a manager for this team, so if you know anyone or would like to be our manager thatd be highly appreciated as well

Yo XSirBoy. It's lols. Still need a manager. I'm not interested in competitive play myself. Since I have uni and everything I'm taking a nice season on the side lines. But I'd be in for managing. Let me know what needs doing.

I'll let you know after I get back.
Currently 'Gold' has offered to be our manager but I'll ask if he wants to do this long term or not. If you would like to help we could discuss it over with Gold as well.

Guys, for more information please add Rakragap for now.
I'll be away until the 22nd of February and will be unable to reply you
Just add up Rakragap for any inquieries.

-XSirCution
